theres probably some realy simple answer but i cant download this episode i am new to the site and when i click download torent it downloads in about 1 second and just comes up with an error message how do you download the file thanks ben

"mini_mad at 2006-10-07 02:20 GMT: 

theres probably some realy simple answer but i cant download this episode i am new to the site and when i click download torent it downloads in about 1 second and just comes up with an error message how do you download the file thanks ben"

first you need to download bitlord or bitcomet and install it, then click "download this torrent" and it should open up in bitlord/bitcomet. if it doesnt open, right click on "download this torrent" and save the torrent file to a file and open the torrent file with bitlord/bitcomet and your done :)

Hi deathmule

Many thanks for another great Lost upload.  Season 2 has just finished here in the UK so this is much appreciated.  Keep up the good work and look forward to downloading each weekly episode of Lost.
Thank you thank you thank you.  will you be posting all the episodes?

Hi Deathmule
Will you be doing a separate/individual torrent for each new episode or compiling episodes into blocks.  Personally I like the idea of individual torrents for each new episode/two episodes and possibly a compile every six episodes or so.  Food for thought and as you're the one doing the work obviously your call.
I hope the next episode is just around the corner. :D
